price: Ergasii sana booda gara galtan, Odoo tolli Rabbiitiifi rahmanni Isaa isin irra jiraachuu baatee, silaa isin warra hoongaye irraa taatu.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaytum min baʿdi dhālika falawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu lakuntum mina al-khāsirīna
